title: Where can I get a copy of Ni Nyampinga Magazine?
content: Ni Nyampinga magazine is published four times a year and is free of charge. It is sent out to every district in Rwanda. A network of Girl ambassadors personally bring the magazine to schools, churches, health centres, youth centres and anywhere else where girls gather together. The ambassadors spend a week making sure the magazines reaches at least 30 outlets in every district. We are currently working on creating fixed outlets where you will be able to pick up the magazine anytime.
